Text: Can someone elaborate what exactly restored edition is? what does the extra GB contain?

What does "Restored" mean?
Answer: From the readme file inside the torrent:
This CD includes all the utilities
found in Hiren's Boot CD 14.0 (May 2011) [1]
and it is Restored to contain all the commercial utilities
omitted from the official HBCD releases (since version 11.0.)

Hiren's Boot DVD 14.0 Restored Edition v2.0 by PROTEUS | 1.56GB

This CD includes all the utilities found in Hiren's Boot CD 14.0 (May 2011) and it is restored to contain all the commercial utilities omitted from the official HBCD releases (since version 11.0.) It also includes the Acronis True Image Home 2011 and other useful software fully integrated within Hiren's menus.
..
For the complete list of utilities in the official Hiren's Boot CD read the files HBCD.txt and changes.txt.

Below are listed the additional programmes and utilities found in this DVD. The numbers in square brackets [] are referring to the URLs listed at the bottom of this file.

---------------------------
Restored DOS utilities
---------------------------

These are found within the HBCD DOS menu.

-- Acronis Disk Director 10.0 (build 2.160)
-- Acronis True Image 8.1 (build 945)
-- Active Partition Recovery (3.0)
-- Active Password Changer (3.0.420)
-- Active Undelete (5.5)
-- Drive Image (5.6)
-- ERD Explorer
-- GetDataBack for FAT/NTFS (4.0)
-- HDD Regenerator (1.71)
-- NTFS Pro
-- Norton Ghost 11.5.1
-- Norton PartitionMagic Pro Server (8.05)
-- PC-Check (6.21)
-- Paragon Partition Manager (7.0.1274)
-- Paragon Mount Everything (3.0)
-- Synantec ImageCenter (5.6)

------------------------------------
Other included software
------------------------------------

-- Acronis Boot Disk.
It includes:
-- True Image Home 2011 full version plus pack (build 6.597).
-- Disk Director 11 (build 11.0.2121).

-- Active Boot Disk (5.3.3)
With the option to boot either in a DOS or Win7 environment. Contains tools to image disks, data recovery, partition management, password resetting, data erasure, network access and other system utilities

-- Avast Registry Editor
-- Easeus Partition Master (6.5.2)

-- GetData Recover My Files Pro (4.6.8.933)
-- Ghost Cast Server
-- Ghost Image Explorer
-- HWiNFO (3.65)
-- Kaspersky Rescue Disk (10.0.29.2) Updated 15 May 2011
-- Outlook Express Backup (6.5)
-- Passware Kit Enterprise (10.3.2585)
-- WinRar (4.00)
-- SysRescueCD (2.1.1 May 2011).
A live Linux Gentoo based rescue CD. It includes many tools for rescuing and managing Linux and windows systems. Hundreds of utilities. e.g. Clam antivirus, Gparted, ntfs-3g, wifi access, syslinux, telnet, ssh, PXE boot, Firefox, vim, MC...

-- RiP linux (12.7)
Slackware based live rescue CD. It used to be part of Hiren's boot CD.
a big THANKS for the profs.

Anyone got any docs on how to customize Hiren's?
Like, add your own utilities to the mini-XP USB boot.
???????? how to burn this on a cd..

Thank you so very much! Will seed for a month!
I can't stand Hiren without some of the features they took out because it was commercial releases. Things like HDDRegenerator and GetData back have saved my skin so many times! Thanks again!
But I'm afraid there isn't away to make ALL of them usable from a thumb drive... Besides building one with only the content of HBCD folder, is it ?
